name: Galaxeroids
description:
The Galaxeroid hordes are the scourge of known universe and now they have their sights set on the Milky Way...

Hit the mothership or the lone attackers to collect power ups and the awesome destructorb.

Take out the minion swarms to go head-to-head with the mothership in a fight to the death.

Only you stand between the Galaxeroids and total galaxy domination. Good luck!
